plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % letters
Password must contain at least 1 letter

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % lowercase letters
Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % uppercase letters
Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % numerical digits
Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % special symbols
Password must contain at least 1 special symbol

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least % non-letter characters
Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character
